info.name: Firefox 4 - Quick Find with Full Controls
info.description: Adds the full Find-in-Page Controls normally reserved for when you press "CTRL-F" or select "Find" from the Firefox Menu to the Quick Find (Find-As-You-Type) Menu.  Also extends the length of the text box a bit.
info.additionalInfo:
Lifted from pawelkl's "Slim Find/QuickFind toolbar"

http://userstyles.org/styles/7322/slim-find-quickfind-toolbar

as I only required the full featured bar on Quick Find and not all the color-changing and padding removing of the source style.

I also lifted a snippet of KuRmA's "Find Bar - like Google Chrome II"

http://userstyles.org/styles/45007/find-bar-like-google-chrome-ii

as I wanted a longer text box with more room to type.  The default size is about 12em and I extended it to 18em but you can, of course, pick whatever size works for you by adjusting the number in the code (or deleting that bit entirely if you are happy with Firefox's default value).
